textfields.tf: For PC diagnosis a commercially available PC is sufficient.
More about purchase of the ECAS Diagnostic Software you will get to know in module 3 of this course.
WABCO Diagnostic Interface Set (serial): with connecting cable for COM interface Order no. 446 301 021 0
WABCO Diagnostic Interface Set (USB): with connecting cable for USB interface and driver software Order no. 446 301 022 0
Hardware requirements of the diagnostic software:
ca. 30 MB free hard disk memory
Color display 1024x768 pixels at the minimum
a free COM interface (9 pins) resp. USB connection
Operating system Windows 9x or Windows NT 4.0 / 2000 / XP or compatible successors
